content.rendered:
Weight and size

We calculate the size limits of your bag by adding the total outside dimensions of each bag, length + width + height.

For all regions, your checked baggage allowance is:

  • Dimension: 62 in / 158 cm
  • Weight: 50 lbs / 23 kgs
  • For First / Business Class and Brazil, weight is 70 lbs / 32 kgs

Charges to / from Asia

Region Bag 1 Bag 2 Bag 3 Bag 4+
Mexico / Caribbean / Central America/ South America $0 $0 $200 $200
Brazil $0 $0 $85 $85
Transatlantic $0 $0 $200 $200

Charges to / from U.S. Domestic

Region Bag 1 Bag 2 Bag 3 Bag 4+
Domestic $25 $35 $150 $200
Mexico $25 $40 $150 $200
Caribbean $25 $40/$55** $150 $200
Central America $0/$25** $40/$55** $150 $200
Brazil $0 $0 $85 $85
South America $0/$25** $0/$40** $150 $200
Transatlantic $0 $100 $200 $200
Transpacific $0 $0 $200 $200

**Baggage fee based on travel date and destination.

For more details visit : http://www.american eagle.com/Baggage/Baggage-Information

American Eagle Airlines Hand|Cabin Baggage

American Eagle Airlines Excess Baggage
